TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SectionInformation extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含有关配置层次结构中单个节的元数据。

span.span: Contains metadata about an individual section within the configuration hierarchy.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对象包含有关在配置层次结构中的各个节的元数据。The object contains the metadata about an individual section within the configuration hierarchy. 为了验证和更改的各个节的属性，可以使用此对象。This object can be used in order to validate and change the properties of an individual section. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取与关联的元数据对象。The following example shows how to get the metadata that is associated with a object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#91](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#91)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#91](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#91)] 下面的示例摘自由前面的示例配置文件。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file that is used by the previous example. ```
```

span.span: A value that indicates where in the configuration file hierarchy the associated object can be declared.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowLocation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示配置节是否允许 特性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the configuration section allows the attribute.

value.span: 如果允许 特性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the attribute is allowed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`false`、属性指示部分可通过本机代码读取器。When set to `false`, the property indicates that the section is accessed by native-code readers. 因此，使用`location`不允许属性，因为本机代码读取器不支持的概念`location`。Therefore, the use of the `location` attribute is not allowed, because the native-code readers do not support the concept of `location`. ## Examples 此部分中的示例演示如何获取之后访问配置文件中的相关的部分信息的属性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下面的示例获取对象。The following example gets the object. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConfigSource { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含文件的名称，关联配置节在其中定义（如果存在这样一个文件）。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the include file in which the associated configuration section is defined, if such a file exists.

value.span: 包含文件的名称，关联的 在其中定义（如果存在这样一个文件）；否则为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The name of the include file in which the associated is defined, if such a file exists; otherwise, an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示的值`configSource`为指定的属性与关联的对象对象。The property represents the value of the `configSource` attribute that is specified for a object that is associated with the object. A实现可以选择指定单独的文件在其中定义该部分的配置设置。A implementation can optionally specify a separate file in which the configuration settings for that section are defined. 这可以是多种方式发挥作用：This can be useful in multiple ways: - 使用包含文件可能会导致配置文件的更具逻辑性和模块化结构。Using include files can result in a more logical and modular structure for configuration files. - 文件访问安全性和权限可用于限制对节的配置设置的访问。File-access security and permissions can be used to restrict access to sections of configuration settings. - 可以修改并重新加载而无需重新启动应用程序中的包含文件不在应用程序初始化期间使用的设置。Settings in an include file that are not used during application initialization can be modified and reloaded without requiring an application restart. 下面的示例演示如何在配置文件中使用此属性，可指定`pages`节定义的外部的包含文件中：The following example shows how this attribute is used in a configuration file to specify that the `pages` section is defined in an external include file: `` 如果包含文件的配置中设置任何要求应用程序时对其进行修改，重新启动设置属性`true`。If any of the settings in a configuration include file require the application to restart when they are modified, set the property to `true`. 在 ASP.NET 应用程序在运行的时可以将分配给属性替代的配置文件的名称。In ASP.NET applications, at run time you can assign to the property the name of an alternative configuration file. 在这种情况下，通过在 Web.config 文件中包含的默认连接字符串信息将覆盖的文件的内容。In that case, the contents of the file are overwritten by the default connection string information that is contained in the Web.config file. 时可选的文件不存在并在运行时创建它时，也会发生此情况。This occurs also when the alternative file does not exist and it is created at run time. 如果 Web.config 文件不包含任何连接字符串信息，部分为空被添加到该备用文件。If the Web.config file does not contain any connection string information, an empty section is added to the alternative file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConfigurationBuilder As ConfigurationBuilder

summary.span: 获取此配置节的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object for this configuration section.

value.span: 此配置节的 对象。

span.span: The object for this configuration section.

summary.span: 强制关联的配置节出现在配置文件中。

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它从父文件中继承时，一个配置节，则不写入配置文件中。A configuration section is not written in a configuration file when it is inherited from a parent file. 如果你想要显示在子配置文件的父部分，则必须设置到`true`。If you want the parent section to show in the child configuration file, you must set the to `true`. 此代理类使配置文件从一台计算机更易于移植，到另一个过程。This makes a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 这还允许你确保部分存在即使你不能控制父配置文件。This also lets you make sure that the section exists even if you do not have control over parent configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration() cil managed

summary.span: 强制关联的配置节出现在配置文件中。

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法强制将此声明都写入到配置文件。The method forces this declaration to be written to the configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 方法可以强制写入配置文件，即使部分不需要，因为它已在父文件中声明的声明。The method can force a declaration to be written to a configuration file, even if the section is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. 使用方法可以使配置文件从一台计算机更移植到另一个。Using the method can make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 这样可以确保部分存在甚至当你没有控制父配置文件。It enables you to make sure that the section exists even when you do not have control over parent configuration files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool force) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool require) cil managed

summary.span: 强制关联的配置节出现在配置文件中，或者从配置文件中移除现有节。

span.span: Forces the associated configuration section to appear in the configuration file, or removes an existing section from the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法强制将此声明，以将写入配置文件，如果`force`是`true`。The method forces this declaration to be written to the configuration file if `force` is `true`. 如果`force`是`false`，可能会忽略此操作，如果声明所需的系统。If `force` is `false`, this action might be ignored if the declaration is required by the system. > [!NOTE] > 方法可以强制写入配置文件，即使此部分不需要，因为它已在父文件中声明的声明。The method can force a declaration to be written to a configuration file, even if this section is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. 使用方法可以使配置文件从一台计算机更移植到另一个。Using the method can make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another. 这还允许你确保部分存在即使你不能控制父配置文件。This also lets you make sure that the section exists even if you do not have control over parent configuration files. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#113](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#113)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#113](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#113)]

exception.span: 为 ，且关联的节无法导出到子配置文件，或者该节未声明。

span.span: is and the associated section cannot be exported to the child configuration file, or it is undeclared.

para.span: 如果保存配置文件（即使没有修改），则 ASP.NET 将重新启动应用程序。

span.span: If the configuration file is saved (even if there are no modifications), ASP.NET restarts the application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool InheritInChildApplications { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在关联配置节中指定的设置是否由驻留在相关应用程序子目录中的应用程序继承。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the settings that are specified in the associated configuration section are inherited by applications that reside in a subdirectory of the relevant application.

value.span: 如果此 对象中指定的设置是由子应用程序继承的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the settings specified in this object are inherited by child applications; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示`inheritInChildApplications`属性`location`配置文件中的元素。The property represents the `inheritInChildApplications` attribute of a `location` element in a configuration file. 设置到`false`以防止特定设置到某些位置 （例如网站的根目录中） 从继承而来的应用程序在子目录中存在。Set to `false` to prevent settings that are specific to a certain location (such as the root directory of a Web site) from being inherited by applications that exist in subdirectories. 下面的示例演示如何使用配置文件中的此属性可指定，在网站的根位置元素中定义的设置，不应由子应用程序继承：The following example shows how to use this attribute in a configuration file to specify that the settings defined in the location element for the root of a Web site should not be inherited by child applications: `` 应用仅为位置的特定配置设置的属性。The property applies only to location-specific configuration settings. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取值对象。The following example shows how to get the value of a object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回`true`时的相关的节被锁定或属性。The property returns `true` when the related section is locked by the or the property. 节被锁定，如果它不能重写或当前的配置文件中定义。A section is locked if it cannot be overridden or defined in the current configuration file. ## Examples 此部分中的示例演示如何获取之后访问配置文件中的相关的部分信息的属性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下面的示例获取对象。The following example gets the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 受保护的配置节是加密且只读的。Protected configuration sections are encrypted and read-only. 有关受保护的配置节的详细信息，请参阅[加密配置信息使用受保护的配置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information about protected configuration sections, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ## Examples 此部分中的示例演示如何获取之后访问配置文件中的相关的部分信息的属性值。The examples in this section show how to get the property value after accessing the related section information in the configuration file. 下面的示例获取对象。The following example gets the object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#102)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#102)] 下面的示例获取值。The following example gets the value. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#106)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#106)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::OverrideMode OverrideMode { System::Configuration::OverrideMode get(); void set(System::Configuration::OverrideMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 枚举值，该枚举值指定子配置文件是否可以重写关联的配置节。

span.span: Gets or sets the enumeration value that specifies whether the associated configuration section can be overridden by child configuration files.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否资源声明内`location`元素可以由子配置文件重写。The property gets or sets a value that indicates whether resources declared inside a `location` element can be overridden by child configuration files. 属性获取或设置一个值，指定类似的行为，但这样做的特定配置元素或组，并使用其中一个枚举值。The property gets or sets a value that specifies similar behavior, but does so for a specific configuration element or group, and uses one of the enumeration values. 属性启用行为以从父元素继承。The property enables behavior to be inherited from a parent element. 你不能以编程方式同时设置和属性。You cannot programmatically set both the and property. 设置属性`true`设置属性。Setting the property to `true` sets the property to . 设置属性`false`设置属性`false`。Setting the property to `false` sets the property to `false`.

exception.span: 尝试更改 和 属性，出于兼容性原因，不支持这种更改。

span.span: An attempt was made to change both the and properties, which is not supported for compatibility reasons.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::OverrideMode OverrideModeDefault { System::Configuration::OverrideMode get(); void set(System::Configuration::OverrideMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定子配置文件对配置节的默认重写行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the default override behavior of a configuration section by child configuration files.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置节的属性只能设置为或值枚举。The property of a configuration section can only be set to the or value of the enumeration. 设置属性等效于将该值设置为。Setting the property to is equivalent to setting the value to .

exception.span: 在父配置节中指定重写行为。

span.span: The override behavior is specified in a parent configuration section.

value.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回或。This property returns either or .

value.span: 此 对象受保护的配置提供程序。

span.span: The protected configuration provider for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未受保护节属性是`null`。For unprotected sections, the property is `null`. 有关受保护的配置节的详细信息，请参阅[加密配置信息使用受保护的配置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information about protected configuration sections, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取值对象。The following example shows how to get the value of a object. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#108)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ProtectSection(string protectionProvider) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ProtectSection(string provider) cil managed

summary.span: 标记用于保护的配置节。

span.span: Marks a configuration section for protection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将加密该节进行了标记，因此它会写以加密形式在磁盘上。The method marks the section for encryption so it will be written in encrypted form on disk. 默认情况下包括以下保护提供程序：The following protection providers are included by default: > [!NOTE] > 如果调用方法替换`null`参数或空字符串，类用作保护提供程序。If you call the method with a `null` parameter or an empty string, the class is used as the protection provider. 有关受保护的配置节的详细信息，请参阅[加密配置信息使用受保护的配置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For more information about protected configuration sections, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#94](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/CS/SectionInforrmation.cs#94)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement#94](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement/VB/SectionInforrmation.vb#94)]

span.span: The property is set to .
\- or -

exception.span: 目标部分已是受保护的数据部分。

span.span: The target section is already a protected data section.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RequirePermission { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示关联的配置节是否需要访问权限。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated configuration section requires access permissions.

value.span: 如果将 特性设置为 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the attribute is set to ; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为`true`、`GetSection`方法将受到限制的应用程序的信任级别设置。When is set to `true`, the `GetSection` methods are restricted by the trust level setting of the application. 这意味着方法或允许对配置节处理程序的访问的属性将设置为 Web 应用程序的信任级别受到限制。This means that methods or properties that allow access to configuration section handlers are restricted by the trust level set for the Web application. > [!NOTE] > 由于高和完全信任允许访问当前的应用程序域之外的文件的唯一级别，应用程序可以仅在这些信任级别上使用配置节处理程序。Because high and full trust are the only levels that allow access to files outside the current application domain, an application can use configuration section handlers only at these trust levels. 当设置为`false`，对配置数据的访问权限不受应用程序的信任级别设置。When is set to `false`, the access to the configuration data is not restricted by the application's trust level settings. > [!NOTE] > 相应的文件 ACL （访问控制列表） 权限是仍必需的而不考虑设置。The appropriate file ACL (Access Control List) permissions are still required, regardless of the setting. ACL 权限确定可以访问配置文件。ACL permissions determine who can access the configuration file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 Web 应用程序的两个可能的信任级别时属性`appSettings`部分`true`。The following example shows two possible trust levels for a Web application when the property of the `appSettings` section is `true`. ``` // With the following trust value // the code below works. // With the following trust value // the code below does not work. ``` 下面的示例演示在的信任级别设置时，运行未出现错误代码为 full。The following example shows code that runs without errors when the trust level is set to full. 否则，该代码会导致出现错误。Otherwise, the code results in an error. ```csharp AppSettingsSection apSection = ConfigurationManager.GetSection("appSettings") as AppSettingsSection; NameValueCollection apSectionCollection = ConfigurationManager.AppSettings; ``` ```vb Dim apSection As AppSettingsSection = _ TryCast(ConfigurationManager.GetSection("appSettings"), AppSettingsSection) Dim apSectionCollection As NameValueCollection = _ ConfigurationManager.AppSettings ```

exception.span: 选定值与某个已定义的值冲突。

span.span: The selected value conflicts with a value that is already defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性`false`以防止重新启动应用程序，此修改外部包含文件中的配置设置时对象。Set the property to `false` to prevent an application restart when configuration settings in the external include file are modified for this object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取属性值对象。The following example shows how to get the property value of a object.
